title: Forbidden: A Romance Anthology
description: Seven authors bring you seven forbidden romance stories with a twist.Prepare for the ride of your life.This gripping collection of angsty tales will have you turning the pages non-stop.Get lost in this set of brand-new, never before released, deliciously ILLICIT romances where the DECEIVED are revealed.The SIN KEEPER will be exposed and ENFORCE HER to abide by the LOVELESS rules where LOLITA is ALL WE KNOW.
author: Yolanda Olson
